item.title: Re: Sannin
item.content:encoded:
He most certainly is. In fact, Alt's trainers: Billy, Cato, Emosuke, Pinky, J-Diddy, K-Dog, Flipper, Lil' Ro, Lil' Shammy, Lil' Bo, Red Rover, Stalkergirl, Bruce Jr., Meatballs, Lil' Whitey, K.Y., Smokey the Bear, Triple H, Bruce Sr., Master P, Terri, Z-Dog, Trapchan, Yuri, The HoClaus, The Rack, Ol' Whitey, Sicko, Snakeman, Annie, Big Ro, Big Shammy, Big Bo.

And that's just the ones I can see.

item.title: Re: Sannin
item.content:encoded:
J-Diddy's easy. You can pick him up from a B-Rank mission :)

Isn't Rich Man's World from Season 2 though? Cato?

Edit: It occurs to me, Cato is probably a trainer in Alt, isn't he?

item.title: Re: Sannin
item.content:encoded: Well, I gotta get J-Diddy somehow, don't I? Aura of Fortune's my next NWW grab, and I've got Rich Man's World jutsu, so I'll mash on those.

item.title: Re: Sannin
item.content:encoded:
Haha, I'm envious :)

Better start saving Ryo. You need to do a lot of partying in the party house in order to hit #1 Daily Ranking!

item.title: Re: Sannin
item.content:encoded: Hoorays. My Kage says our next advancement is the Epic Monument.

item.title: Re: Sannin
item.content:encoded: Apparently not, no. It could be because they're part of the Random Village Alliance, though.

item.title: Re: Sannin
item.content:encoded:
Hehe, yeah, I just looked up Alt Village after I said that, since I remember them being pretty big :P

I'm surprised they don't have an Epic Monument yet. No one's made the Sannin run from Alt?

item.title: Re: Sannin
item.content:encoded: My village has 48 people in it. It can't get much larger.

item.title: Re: Sannin
item.content:encoded: It's not uncommon for people to jump to a larger village to go for Sannin. It seems like a lot of the larger Villages are open to that kind of thing. Generally the BvS community at large seems pretty helpful.

item.title: Re: Sannin
item.content:encoded:
Hoo, that's a tall order. Okay. Ten levels to go, as well as convincing my leader to purchase the Epic Monument, and I need to get The Rack and Snakeman.

I'd only worry about impending End-Of-Season Loss.

item.title: Re: Sannin
item.content:encoded:
Lets see if I can remember all of thisâ€¦

You need to be in a Village with a Monument upgrade, you need to have The Rack, J-Diddy and SNAKEMAN, you need to make #1 ranked player for the day, and you need to be at least level 51. You get a permanent item (Sannin's Premium, which gives 10% more ryo), you get a theme for next season which lets you collect items related to your bloodline, you get access to AA-Rank missions, and I'm guessing you get more stamina too.

item.title: Sannin
item.content:encoded: How do you get it? What are it's advantages?
